Text: Live on the web Richard Tabors on PBSs Nightly Business Report Cc Tabors seconds of TV fame vnpindexjhtmlcallLettersNBRprogramIDst oryID has the text transcript at least it is available today The right annual data a penny per kilowatthour except for the rebates and national figures also got aired This show did NOT play in Los Angeles because of coverage of the Republican convention Regards Fred Frederick H Pickel PhD Vice President Tabors Caramanis Associates Los Angeles California Cambridge Massachusetts email alternate email fred LUMmitedu tel

Electricity supply demand memo and revised San Diego memo Cc Attached are the two memos The quick draft of a memo on electricity supply demand in the West and California A slightly revised memo on the San Diego prices The only change is in a footnote pointing out that even with the increases and without the rebates San Diego residential bills are below the national average Please confirm your receipt of this email I am not certain about your current email address Regards Fred Frederick H Pickel PhD Vice President Tabors Caramanis Associates Los Angeles California Cambridge Massachusetts email alternate email fred LUMmitedu tel Hot prices ver doc Price changes memo ver doc

FW WSCC price spikes Van Vactor Oregon PUC testimonyis a paper on the recent WSCC price spikes by Sam Van Vactor of Economic Insight in Portland Oregon Sam presented this to the Oregon PUC this past Monday Since it addresses the supply demand situation as well as the California utility underscheduling behavior I thought youd like to see it Regards Fred Frederick H Pickel PhD Vice President Tabors Caramanis Associates Los Angeles California Cambridge Massachusetts email alternate email fred LUMmitedu tel Original Message From Sam Van Vactor mailto Sent Wednesday August AM To Subject spikes atthtm SpikesPDF
